name: mapreduce.task.timeout
description:
The number of milliseconds before a task will be
  terminated if it neither reads an input, writes an output, nor
  updates its status string.  A value of 0 disables the timeout.

name: dfs.namenode.heartbeat.recheck-interval
description:
This time decides the interval to check for expired datanodes.
    With this value and dfs.heartbeat.interval, the interval of
    deciding the datanode is stale or not is also calculated.
    The unit of this configuration is millisecond.

name: dfs.client.deadnode.detection.probe.suspectnode.interval.ms
description: Interval time in milliseconds for probing suspect node behavior.

name: mapreduce.job.maps
description:
The default number of map tasks per job.
  Ignored when mapreduce.framework.name is "local".

name: ipc.maximum.response.length
description:
This indicates the maximum IPC message length (bytes) that can be
    accepted by the client. Messages larger than this value are rejected
    immediately to avoid possible OOMs. This setting should rarely need to be
    changed.  Set to 0 to disable.

name: mapreduce.job.cache.limit.max-single-resource-mb
description:
The maximum size (in MB) of a single resource a map reduce job
    is allow to submit for localization via files, libjars, archives, and
    jobjar command line arguments and through the distributed cache. If set to
    0 the limit is ignored.
